labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: You can't close the reactors screen and you are stuck on it and can't do anything until you perform a reload
data.expected_result: The reactors screen should close automatically or you can click off to close it
data.steps_to_repro: - React to a message or find one with reactions on it - Click the drop down on the message and click `Reactions` - Use an alt or have somebody else delete the message while on the reactors screen - Delete the reaction
